description: The latest Social Attitudes Survey shows a dramatic drop in confidence in services such as health.
title: Confidence in public services drops on Isle of Man
title_page: Confidence in public services drops on Isle of Man - BBC News
maintext: Of the emergency services, the police force was the lowest ranked with just 61% saying they had confidence in the constabulary and 75% saying they had not seen a police officer on patrol in their area in the last year.
